item.title: Directory-Tree-Generator
item.description: github Repository: Directory-Tree-Generator This Go program generates a directory tree in text or JSON format. Command-Line Options -d: Specify the starting directory for the directory tree. The default value is . (the current directory). -f: Specify the output format for the directory tree. The available options are txt (text format) and json (JSON format). The default value is txt. -p: Print the directory tree to the console instead of writing it to a file.
